duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct monitoring and surveillance activities to determine new provider capacity and identify areas needing improvement.
Plan and conduct program reviews using Desk Level Reviews (DLRs) and on-site visits of new providers.
Collect, review, and assess data from various sources to determine compliance with program requirements.
Develop compliance review summaries and Corrective Action Plans as applicable.
Use MS Excel and other electronic tools to accurately record data.
Participate in initiatives to support the department's goals and objectives.
Provide excellent customer service in conducting all work.

education_certification.credential: A combination of six (6) years of education and/or professional experience in social services casework, social services program development/delivery, or social services related policy/fiscal/budget administration/analysis work. Preference for experience in conducting program compliance work, and experience with quality assurance and quality improvement development of services for persons with disabilities.
